page.title: 06THINGS TO DO IN DIPTFORD
page.content: Diptford has its own recreation{field. It was constructed in 1977 to coincide with the Queens Silver Jubilee. A Trust gave the money and there is a Village Committee who run it and decide about the amenities. They have provided climbing apparatus, a tennis court and an open space for any ball games. People of all ages use these facilities. A lot of people ride and own horses and go to gymkhanas. Most people have {hobbies} and are returning to the old crafts of spinning, weaving and knitting sheeps wool. Some pursue them out of the village at local {sport}and craft centres. Many people have around their homes attractive gardens and spend much time visiting garden centres to buy seeds and plants. { }
